Name: AmeliaBR
AboutMe:
I'm a freelance writer specializing in scientific and technical communication, with a particular interest in data visualization. On Stack Exchange, I most frequently contribute to the d3.js and svg tags on Stack Overflow, but I also chime in on Graphic Design, User Experience, and English Language & Usage, among others. My top scoring answer remains a little bit of absurdity on Puzzles & Code Golf (although it was far from the top scoring answer to that question).

You can find me under the handle AmeliaBR on other code-related sites such as Codepen, Github, or Web Platform Docs. As Amelia Bellamy-Royds, I'm the co-author of SVG Essentials, 2nd Edition (with J. David Eisenberg) and the forthcoming Using SVG with CSS3 and HTML5 (with Kurt Cagle).
